dismissable_rag_modal.description: You can now chat with your own documents to get answers, insights, and summaries using Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG). Here's how it works:

attach_files.title: Attach Files
attach_files.description: Upload up to 5 files at a time, with a maximum combined size of 30MB. Supported formats include PDF, DOCX, TXT, and CSV.

be_specific.title: Be Specific
be_specific.description: When asking questions, mention the document or section you're referring to. This helps narrow down the answer from the most relevant file.

get_responses.title: Get Responses
get_responses.description: The system will scan your attached files and provide relevant answers based on their content. Ask questions as if you were chatting with the documents themselves.

images.title: Images
images.description: Vision-based models also allow for image uploads and analysis.
